title: Covered parking available, Zen like scenery and tree lined walkways
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 940 Sq.
If you are searching for a place to live in the heart of Silicon Valley that reflects its innovative spirit and modern lifestyle, look no further than Avana Almaden.
We have tapped into this exciting and cutting-edge community to deliver modern apartment homes that perfectly accentuate the character of the city.
At Avana Almaden, an array of amenities provides a cozy and convenient place to stay plugged in when you are not spending time in the office.

Convenient in-home washer and dryer, Abundant closet space, Private patios and balconies, New designer lighting and fixtures*, Upgraded kitchens with stainless steel appliances and sleek quartz countertops*, Additional storage available, Pre-wired for high speed internet

Zen like scenery and tree lined walkways, Bark Park and Bark n' Bubbles Dog Spa coming soon!, Covered parking available, Backyard barbecue grills, Relaxing hydro jet spa, Two swimming pools, Cabana lounges and cozy fire pit, Professionally managed, Picnic area
Please call the Leasing Office for more details.
